attributes.action: Ban the use of online petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know online petitions aren't worth the bits they're stored on.  They're hard to verify and easy to fake and almost always the opinion of complete idiots - from "Ban Halloween because we hate Satan and believe in the Jesus and the Easter bunny " to "Ban selling tickets you've bought which the vendors won't give you money back on because we once paid too much outside a Bon Jovi concert and couldn't afford a coke".  So sign now and take part in the irony! :D

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
